function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of predictive analytics and machine learning for COVID-19 prediction","Impact":"Misleading predictions could lead to inappropriate allocation of resources or incorrect policy decisions","Mitigation":"Ensure thorough validation and cross-validation of prediction models and incorporate expert knowledge in decision-making","Technologies":"Cross-validation techniques, expert systems, data validation tools","People":"Healthcare authorities, policymakers, public health officials","Owner":"Data scientists, public health experts"},{"Description":"Application of AI in COVID-19 diagnosis and prediction","Impact":"Inaccurate diagnosis or prediction could lead to delayed treatment and increased spread of the virus","Mitigation":"Validation of AI models with clinical data and continuous monitoring for accuracy","Technologies":"Clinical validation tools, continuous monitoring systems, AI explainability tools","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, public health officials","Owner":"Healthcare data scientists, clinical researchers"},{"Description":"Use of blockchain technology for health passports","Impact":"Data breaches or cyber-security threats could compromise patient privacy and lead to misuse of health passport information","Mitigation":"Implementation of robust encryption, regular security audits, and strict access control measures","Technologies":"Encryption protocols, security audit tools, access control systems","People":"Travellers, healthcare authorities, data protection agencies","Owner":"Blockchain developers, data security experts"}]}
